item.title: March-April 2022
item.description:
See here the schedule for our 3rd block!! We will update it with the talks title and the abstracts.

As usual, talks will be streamed on Crowdcast

9th of March, 5pm CET

Manuel Beiran Parametric control of flexible timing through low-dimensional neural manifolds - Center for Theoretical Neuroscience, Columbia University & Rajan Lab, Icahn Mount Sinai. Abstract | Replay

Laureline Logiaco Flexible motor sequence generation by thalamic control of cortical dynamics through low-rank connectivity perturbations - Center for Theoretical Neuroscience, Columbia University. Abstract | Replay

30th of March, 5pm CET

Tamar Koren: “Insular cortex neurons encode and retrieve specific immune responses” - Rolls Lab, Technion.

Alexandra Klein: “Brain-body interactions that modulate fear” - Kheirbeck Lab, UCSF.

6th of April, 5pm CET

Payam Piray: Title TBA - Daw Lab, Princeton University.

Yul Kang: “Spatial uncertainty provides a unifying account of navigation behavior and grid field deformations” - Lengyel Lab, Cambridge University.
